title: Saying More With Less and Why It Matters: Verbs v. Nouns: Unify by Reintegrating Communal Practices
description:
Michael and Karen reflect on the attack on language, how language affects reality, how consciousness has evolved, and the way technologies lead us away from meaning.

George Orwell essay:  https://www.orwell.ru/library/essays/politics/english/e_polit

The Symbolic World essay:  https://thesymbolicworld.com/articles/marshall-mcluhan-and-eastern-christianity-probing-an-interfaith-interface-with-the-symbolic-world-in-mind/

Less than Words Can Say by Richard Mitchell - a few used books from $7.00
https://www.amazon.com/gp/offer-listing/0316575062/ref=tmm_hrd_used_olp_0?ie=UTF8&condition=used&qid=1596486927&sr=8-1

Poetic Diction by Owen Barfield. 
https://www.amazon.com/Poetic-Diction-Meaning-Owen-Barfield/dp/0955958245/ref=sr_1_1?crid=SK1LAGY46Z97&dchild=1&keywords=poetic+diction+owen+barfield&qid=1596487035&s=books&sprefix=poetic+diction%2Cstripbooks%2C210&sr=1-1

The Great War between C. S. Lewis and Owen Barfield
